channel.title: Vote Black Mesa as Mod of the Year on Moddb!
channel.description:
[b]Update 25/12/2012(OR 12/25/2012)[/b]
Today Santa has come with an awesome present:
[b]Black Mesa is the Moddb of the Year 2012[/SIZE][/b]
On behalf of Black Mesa dev. team, I want to thank you for your support.
It has been an amazing year and more things are gonna come...
![](upload://xIkrHIhCtx0uvI9P7EiWkj68QU2.png) [quote] [b]Update 21/12/2012 (or 12/21/2012)[/b]
Poll is over, waiting for results... [/quote]
[quote] [b]Update 11/12/2012 ( or 12/11/2012)[/b]
First round of Poll is over and Black Mesa has been selected in the top 100. Now it's time to vote BM as [b]Mod Of The Year 2012[/b]:
link to vote(you must log-in):[url='https://www.moddb.com/events/2012-mod-of-the-year-awards/top100#vote4384']https://www.moddb.com/events/2012-mod-of-the-year-awards/top100#vote4384[/url]
[b]A note about voting[/b]: You can even vote as a Guest but It's suggested to sign-in and then vote([url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=527371&postcount=40']Moddb could not register your vote[/url]). [/quote]
[QUOTE=Op 1/12/2012] Hi!
You can vote Black Mesa as "Mod of the year" on [url='https://www.moddb.com/']Moddb.com[/url]
How to:
1- [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa']Go to Black mesa page on moddb[/url]
2- Click on the banner to vote.
3- You must log-in to vote(if you don't have an account you can create it)
I know that calling Black Mesa just a "mod" is reductive but the Dev team deserves it! [/QUOTE]

item.title: Vote Black Mesa as Mod of the Year on Moddb!
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

You already have your mind made up Teh so I dont see the point in listing out the details of the production process and whether or not there was EVER a â€˜fuck the communityâ€™ mentality. Suffice it to say that you are not going to find a whole lot of folks on this forum to agree with you.

But back to the topicâ€¦ did anyone else have the problem with voting as a guest? I had to login in order to vote but every time I clicked on the vote as a guest it kept throwing the â€˜you have to wait 3 minutesâ€™. At first I assumed a conspiracy, but then someone on the team suggested it could have been me and 50 other â€˜guestsâ€™ attempting to vote at the same time.

Thoughts?

IÂ´m pretty aware of that before I posted it :p.

Read full topic

item.title: Vote Black Mesa as Mod of the Year on Moddb!
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
You already have your mind made up Teh so I dont see the point in listing out the details of the production process and whether or not there was EVER a â€˜fuck the communityâ€™ mentality. Suffice it to say that you are not going to find a whole lot of folks on this forum to agree with you.

But back to the topicâ€¦ did anyone else have the problem with voting as a guest? I had to login in order to vote but every time I clicked on the vote as a guest it kept throwing the â€˜you have to wait 3 minutesâ€™. At first I assumed a conspiracy, but then someone on the team suggested it could have been me and 50 other â€˜guestsâ€™ attempting to vote at the same time.

Thoughts?

Read full topic
